award_title: NSF R2I2: The Northern Great Plains Regional Incubator for Drought Resiliency
subject: Deploying ML models to agencies vs. publishing them?
body:
Getting ML models and sensor data pipelines running at tribal nations and agencies—not just described in papers—seems like the hardest part of regional incubator work.

I built Ouro to help researchers share computational tools that actually run elsewhere, not just live in supplementary materials.

Up for a chat after the holidays?

Best,

Matt Moderwell
https://ouro.foundation
